doc:
Larry Linville https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Larry_Linville 0 Lawrence Lavon Linville (September 29, 1939 – April 10, 2000) was an American actor known for his portrayal of the surgeon Major Frank Burns on the television series M*A*S*H. Lawrence_Lavon_Linville ( September_29_,_1939 – April_10_,_2000 ) was an_American_actor known for his_portrayal of the_surgeon Major_Frank_Burns on the_television_series_M * A_*_S * H.
